mapper.sql: ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS_RECEIVE_NAME, ADDRESS_ADD, ADDRESS_MOBILE, ADDRESS_ZIPCODE, ADDRESS_STATE, DD_USER_ID, ADDRESS_CREATEDATE
mapper.insert:
insert into DANGDANG_ADDRESS (ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS_RECEIVE_NAME, ADDRESS_ADD, ADDRESS_MOBILE, ADDRESS_ZIPCODE, ADDRESS_STATE, DD_USER_ID, ADDRESS_CREATEDATE) values (DD_ADDRESS_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{addressReceiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ddUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addressCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
select DD_ADDRESS_ID_SEQ.currval from dual
mapper.select: select ADDRESS_ID from DANGDANG_ADDRESS where ADDRESS_RECEIVE_NAME=#{addressReceiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ADDRESS_ADD=#{addressAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ADDRESS_ZIPCODE=#{addressZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ADDRESS_MOBILE=#{addressMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DD_USER_ID=#{ddUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
